title: How to Verify a Solution
text: If a point is a solution to a system, then it satisfies both equations.

title: Plugging in the Point
text: Let us plug in the point. 2(-3)+3(4)=6. The first equation is satisfied. $$4=\frac{2}{3} \left(-3\right)+2$$. The second equation is not satisfied, so the point is not a solution.
